mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (id, nickname, mobileAreaId, mobile, sex, email, jdata, PIN, createTime, updateTime, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileareaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdata,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update user set nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobileAreaId = #{mobileareaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jdata = #{jdata,jdbcType=CHAR}, PIN = #{pin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, nickname, mobileAreaId, mobile, sex, email, jdata, PIN, createTime, updateTime, type from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, nickname, mobileAreaId, mobile, sex, email, jdata, PIN, createTime, updateTime, type from user
